original_text: The people who lived near Zechariah and Elizabeth were very surprised. They saw how great God was. Many people who lived in the hills of Judea also talked about all these things. The people who lived near Zechariah and Elizabeth were very surprised. They saw how great God was. Many people who lived in the hills of Judea also talked about all these things.
korean_text: 그 근처에 사는 자가 다 두려워하고 이 모든 말이 온 유대 산골에 두루 퍼지매

sentences.original_text: The people who lived near Zechariah and Elizabeth
They saw how great God was
Many people who lived in the hills of Judea
also talked about all these things
